name: PCIPercutaneousCoronaryIntervention_ClinicalGroupingCondition_CPT
title: PCI (Percutaneous Coronary Intervention)_Clinical Grouping Condition_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for PCI Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute PCI Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: PCI Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: PCI Codes that constitute the PCI Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
